  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:mats_318</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>mats_318</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Teorema de Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">Pythagoras' Theorem</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Pythagorases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Théorème de Pythagore</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Theorem De Pythagoras'</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Teorema Del Pythagoras</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θεώρημα Πυθαγόρα</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el teorema de Pitágoras. Se introduce el concepto de triángulo rectángulo, así como sus diferentes elementos, se estudia el  enunciado del teorema de Pitágoras y su demostración.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to teach Pythagoras's theorem. The concept of right triangle and its different elements are introduced and the theorem is enunciated and demonstrated.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">cateto</string>
            <string language="en">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">triángulo</string>
            <string language="en">triangle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">teorema de Pitágoras</string>
            <string language="en">Pythagoras's theorem</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">rectángulo</string>
            <string language="en">right</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">hipotenusa</string>
            <string language="en">hypotenuse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">demostración</string>
            <string language="en">demonstration</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, Theorem Pythagorases zu unterrichten. Das Konzept 
des rechten Dreiecks und seine unterschiedlichen Elemente werden 
eingeführt und das Theorem wird ausgesprochen und demonstriert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations d'enseigner le théorème de Pythagore. Le concept 
de la bonne triangle et ses différents éléments sont présentés et
le théorème est déclaré et démontré.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações ensinar o
theorem de Pythagoras. O conceito do triângulo direito e seus 
elementos diferentes são introduzidos e o theorem enunciated e é 
demonstrado.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
insegnare teorema del Pythagoras. Il concetto di giusto 
triangolo ed i relativi elementi differenti sono introdotti ed il 
teorema è enunciato e dimostrato.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να διδάξει το θεώρημα Πυθαγόρα. Η έννοια του σωστού 
τριγώνου και τα διαφορετικά στοιχεία της εισάγονται και το 
θεώρημα διατυπώνεται και καταδεικνύεται.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">cathetus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dreieck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Theorem Pythagorases</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">cathetus</string>
